text: ...Hey.
Didn't expect to see you again.
Turns out I just had a concussion.
I'm not used to getting hurt, so, I figured death was upon me.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: You freed an evil Omar Clean?
Sounds like another case.
But... perhaps we can start tomorrow? I'm a little sore.
I'm going to head to my aunt's house.
I'll be in touch when I'm ready to tackle another case.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 1

text: So our prime suspect was actually just trying to protect us from the real murderer.
This has not been a conventional case...
You know what? I'm... upset.
That was a weird case!
Nothing made sense! All my instincts failed!
Alright, that felt good.
I try to not let my emotions get the better of me, usually.
But that was kinda nice.
I guess my aunt was right.
Anyway, I'm glad the case is complete, anyway.
Not sure how I'm going to explain this to my client, though...
dialogue.name: Dialogue 2

text: You killed every Omar Clean in existence?
That's actually a second-best case scenario.
Not for Omar Clean, obviously.
I'd have liked this to have worked out more cleanly, but...
At least this way there are no loose ends.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 3

text: Listen, I...
I'm sort of not great at the emotional side of things, but...
Thanks.
You helped me out a lot with this case.
If you want to team up again, let me know.
Alright then.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0

text: I'm going to need some time to get myself together.
At some point in the future, I'll contact you about this "rogue Omar".
He doesn't seem to have done anything immediately troublesome, so we should have time.
For now, let's lay low.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 1

text: Things seem stable now.
I'm happy to say this case is closed.
Good working with you. You're a valuable asset.
Until next time.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 2

text: Thanks again for your help back there.
I hope we get a chance to work together again.
dialogue.name: Dialogue 0
